SA11n1085:7: buddhatvasya aśeṣadharmahetumūlaṃ karuṇaiveti jñātvā sā''dāveva bhāvayitavyā |
SA11n1085:8: yathoktam āryadharmasaṃgītisūtre-“atha khalvavalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahasattvo bhagavantametadavocat-na bhagavan bodhisattvena atibahuṣu dharmeṣu śikṣitavyam |
SA11n1085:9: eko dharmo bhagavan bodhisattvena svārādhitaḥ supratividdhaḥ kartavyaḥ |
SA11n1085:13: mahākaruṇayā bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ sarvabuddhadharmāḥ karatalagatā bhavanti |
SA11n1085:14: tadyathā bhagavan yena rājñaścakravartina-ścakraratnaṃ gacchati tena sarvo balakāyo gacchati,
SA11n1085:15: evameva bhagavan yena bodhisattvasya mahākaruṇa gacchati,
SA11n1085:17: tadyathā bhagavan jīvitendriye sati anyeṣāmindriyāṇāṃ pravṛttirbhavati,
SA11n1085:18: evameva bhagavan mahākaruṇāyāṃ satyāmanyeṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ] dharmāṇāṃ pravṛttirbhavati |“ iti |
SA11n1085:27: evameva mahāyāna-sambhāra-samudāgamāya bodhisattvasya mahākaruṇā pūrvaṅgamā“ iti vistaraḥ |
SA11n1085:36: tathā hi tayā preryamāṇā bodhisattvāḥ svātmanirapekṣā ekāntena paropakārārthatayā atiduṣkaradīrghakālike'pi sambhāropārjanapariśrame pravartante |
SA11n1085:37: tathā coktam āryaśraddhābalādhāne-“tatra [mahā] karuṇayāpi sarvasattvaparipācanārthaṃ na tat kiñcit sukhopādhānaṃ yanna parityajati |
SA11n1085:39: ato'tiduṣkare pravartamāno nacireṇaiva sambhārān paripūryāvaśyameva sarvajñapadam adhigacchati |
SA11n1085:41: mahākaruṇāparigrahādeva buddhā bhagavanto'dhigamya sarvajñapadam aśeṣasya jagato'rtha vikurvāṇāstiṣṭhanta iti nirvāṇāpratiṣṭhāne saiva bhagavatāṃ mahākaruṇā hetuḥ |
SA11n1085:43: sarve ca te sattvāstridhātukāvacarāstrividhaduḥkhatayā yathoyogam atyanta duḥkhitā eveti sarveṣveva sattveṣu bhāvanīyam |
SA11n1085:44: tathā ca ye tāvannārakāste vividhacirantanadīrghakālikadāhādiduḥkha [nadīṣu] nimagnā eva bhagavatā varṇitāḥ |
SA11n1085:45: tathā pretā api duḥsahatīvrakṣuttṛṣādiduḥkha[agni] pīḍābhisaṃśoṣitamūrtayastīvraduḥkham anubhavanti |
SA11n1085:46: yena varṣaśatenāpyaśuciṃ kheṭapiṇḍanaṃ ca bhoktuṃ na labhanta ityādi varṇitaṃ bhagavatā |
SA11n1085:47: tiryañco'pi paraspara [bhakṣaṇa] krodhavadhahiṃsādibhiranekavidhaṃ duḥkhamanubhavanto dṛśyanta eva |
SA11n1085:48: tathā hi kecinnāsikābhedanatāḍāṇabandhanādibhiratantrīkṛtaśarīrāḥ paritaḥ paripīḍayamānāḥ kathamapyanicchanto'pi atidurvahagurubhārodvahanaparikhinnavapuṣaḥ pariklāmyanti,
SA11n1085:49: tathāraṇye'pi nivasanto'naparādhāḥ kecit kvacit [artha] to'nviṣya hanyante |
SA11n1085:50: nityaṃ ca bhayavivhalamānasastatastataḥ palāyamānāstiṣṭhantītyaparimitam eṣāṃ duḥkhaṃ dṛśyatta eva |
SA11n1085:51: tathā mānuṣye'pi nārakaṃ duḥkhaṃ dṛśyata eva |
SA11n1085:52: atra ye caurādayo'ṅgacchedaśūlārpaṇodbandhanādibhiḥ kāryanta eva teṣāṃ nārakameva duḥkham |
SA11n1085:55: ye ca balibhirākramya pīḍayante teṣāṃ tiraścāmiva tāḍanāvarodhanādi duḥkham |
SA11n1085:56: tathā paryeṣṭikṛtam anyo'nyadrohopaghātādi kṛtaṃ priyaviprayogāpriyasaṃyogakṛtaṃ cāprameyameṣāṃ duḥkham |
SA11n1085:57: ye kvacid īśvarāḥ sukhitā iva lapyante te'pi viparyavasānasampado vividhakudṛṣṭigahananimagnā nārakādiduḥkhānubhavahetuvividha kleśakarmāṇyupacinvantaḥ prapātasthāstarava iva duḥkhahetau [api] vartamānāḥ paramārthato duḥkhitā eva |
SA11n1085:58: devā api ye tāvat kāmāvacarāste'pi tīvrakāmāgnisandīptamānasā ākṣiptacittā ivāsvacchacetasaḥ kṣaṇamapi samādhānaṃ cetasāṃ na labhante |
SA11n1085:59: teṣāṃ praśamasukhadhanadaridrāṇāṃ kīdṛśaṃ nāma tat sukham ?
SA11n1085:61: ye ca rūpārūpāvacarāste'pi yadi nāma kiyatkālaṃ duḥkhaduḥkhatāṃ vyatītāstathāpyatyantaṃ kāmāvacarāṇām anuśayānām aprahāṇāt teṣāṃ punarapi nārakādivinipātasambhavād vipariṇāmaduḥkham astyeva |
SA11n1085:62: sarve nāma devamanuṣyāḥ kleśakarmādipāratantryāt te saṃskāraduḥkhatayā duḥkhitā eva |
SA11n1085:63: tadevaṃ sakalameva jagad duḥkhagnijvālāvalīḍham ityavetya yathā mama duḥkhamapriyaṃ tathānyeṣāmapriyamiti cintayatā sarveṣveva sattveṣu kṛpā bhāvanīyā |
SA11n1085:64: prathamaṃ tāvad mitrapakṣeṣu pūrvoktā vividhaduḥkhānubhaveṣvanupaśyatā bhāvanīyā |
SA11n1085:65: tataḥ sattvasamatayā viśeṣamapaśyatā'nādimati ca saṃsāre na kaścit sattvo yo na me śataśo bandhurabhūditi paricintayatā vyasteṣu bhāvanīyā |
SA11n1085:66: yadā mitrapakṣeṣviva vyasteṣu [api] tulyā karuṇā pravṛttā bhavati,
SA11n1085:68: yadā ca śatrupakṣe'pi mitrapakṣavat samapravṛttā bhavati,
SA11n1085:69: tadā kramaśo daśasu dikṣu sarvasattveṣu [api] bhāvayet |
SA11n1085:70: yadā ca duḥkhitabālapriyeṣviva duḥkhoddharaṇecchākārā svarasavāhinī sarvasattveṣu samapravṛttā kṛpā bhavati,
SA11n1085:71: tadā sā niṣpannā bhavati mahākaruṇāvyapadeśaṃ ca labhate |
SA11n1085:75: yathoktam āryadaśadharmasūtre-“sattvān atrāṇān aśaraṇān advīpān dṛṣṭvā karuṇāyai cittamupasthāpya yāvadanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayati“ iti |
SA11n1085:76: yadi nāma parasamādāpanādināpi bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhicittamutpadyate,
SA11n1085:77: tathāpi kṛpāvegato yat svayameva bodhisattvasya bodhicittamutpadyate tad bhagavatā āryatathāgatajñānamudrāsamādhau viśiṣṭataratvena varṇitam |
SA11n1085:78: tadetad bnodhicittaṃ pratipattivikalamapi saṃsāre mahāphalaṃ bhagavatā varṇitam |
SA11n1085:88: yo'pi pāramitāsu sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā śikṣitum asamarthaḥ,
SA11n1085:93: asahaḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā dānapāramitāyāṃ śikṣitum,
SA11n1085:95: tasmāttarhi tvaṃ mahārāja evameva sambodhau chandaṃ śraddhāṃ prārthanāṃ praṇidhiṃ ca,
SA11n1085:96: gacchannapi tiṣṭhannapi niṣaṇṇo'pi śayāno'pi jāgradapi bhuñjāno'pi pibannapi,
SA11n1085:99: sarvabuddhabodhisattvārya śrāvakapratyekabuddhapṛthagjanānām ātmanaśca atītānāgatapratyutpannāni kuśalamūlāni piṇḍayitvā,
SA11n1085:103: tataḥ sarvasattvānāṃ yāvat sarvajñatāpratilambhāya sarvabuddhadharmaparipūraṇāya dine traikālyam anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmaya |
SA11n1085:114: yat punaḥ pratipattisāraṃ bodhicittaṃ tad atitarāṃ vipulaṃ phalam iti siddhim |
SA11n1085:116: bodhicittād vai yat puṇyaṃ tacca rūpi bhaved yadi |
SA11n1085:121: iyaṃ viśiṣyate pūjā yasyā anto na vidyate ||iti |
SA11n1085:122: yathā āryagaṇḍavyūhe varṇitam-“bodhicittaṃ kulaputra ! bījabhūtaṃ sarvabuddhadharmāṇām“ iti vistaraḥ |
SA11n1085:123: tacca bodhicittaṃ dvividhaṃ praṇīdhicittaṃ prasthānacittaṃ ca |
SA11n1085:127: sattvāḥ sattvaloke ye'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau praṇidadhati iti |
SA11n1085:128: tato'pi durlabhatamāste sattvā ye'nuttarāṃ samyaksambodhim abhisamprasthitāḥ“ iti |
SA11n1085:129: sakalajagato hitāya buddho bhaveyamiti prathamataraṃ prārthanākārā cetanā tatpraṇidhicittam |
SA11n1085:130: yataḥ prabhṛti saṃvaragrahaṇe vartamānāḥ sambhāreṣu dṛśyante tatprasthānacittam |
SA11n1085:132: asati pratirūpe grāhake buddhabodhisattvān āmukhīkṛtya yathā mañjuśrīyā'mbararājabhūtena bodhicittamutpāditaṃ tathotpādanīyaḥ |
SA11n1085:133: evamutpāditabodhicitto bodhisattvaḥ svayameva dānādi dadāti pratipattau prayokṣyate,
SA11n1085:134: na hi svayamadāntaḥ parān damayatīti mattvā |
SA11n1085:137: āryasamādhirāje coktam-“tasmāt pratipattisāro bhaviṣyāmi ityevaṃ tvayā kumāra,
SA11n1085:143: sā ca pratipattirbodhisattvasya pāramitā'pramāṇasaṅgrahavastvādibhedena akṣayamatiratnameghādisūtreṣu vistareṇa varṇitā |
SA11n1085:147: sā ceyaṃ saṃkṣepeṇa bodhiattvasya prajñopāyarūpā pratipattirna prajñāmātraṃ nopāyamātram |
SA11n1085:148: yathā āryavimalakirtinirdeśe-“prajñārahita upāya upāyarahitā ca prajñā bodhisattvānāṃ bandhanam“ ityuktam |
SA11n1085:149: upāyasahitā prajñā prajñāsahitā upāyo mokṣatvena varṇitaḥ |
SA11n1085:151: dvābhyāṃ mārgābhyāṃ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kṣipra manuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisambhotsyante |
SA11n1085:154: tatra prajñāpāramitāṃ tyaktvā dānādipāramitāsaṅgrahavastvādikaṃ sarvameva kṣetrapariśuddhimahābhoga[bahu] parivārasampatsattvaparipākanirmāṇādikasakalābhyudayadharmasaṅgrāhakaṃ kuśalam upāya ucyante |
SA11n1085:156: tayā hi samyagupāyaṃ vivicyā'viparyasto yathāvat svaparārthānuṣṭhānād viṣamiva mantraparigṛhītaṃ bhuñjāno na saṃkliśyate |
SA11n1085:157: tathā coktamatraiva sutre-“upāyaḥ saṅgrahajñānam prajñā paricchedajñānam |
SA11n1085:163: etau prajñopāyau dvāvapi sarvakālameva sevanīyau bhūmipraviṣṭairapi na tu prajñāmātraṃ nopāyamātram |
SA11n1085:164: yataḥ sarvāsveva daśasu bhūmiṣu bodhisattvasya pāramitāsamudācāraḥ paṭhito dadhabhūmikādau “na ca pariśeṣāsu na samudācarati“ iti vacanāt |
SA11n1085:165: aṣṭamyāṃ ca bhūmau bodhisattvasya śāntavihāriṇo buddhairvyuttthānaṃ tad virudhyeta |
SA11n1085:167: [tathā coktaṃ tatraiva sūtre] “tasya khalu bho jinaputra,
SA11n1085:168: bodhisattvasya evamimāmacalāṃ bodhisattvabhūmimanugatasya pūrvapraṇidhānabalādhānasthitasya buddhā bhagavantastasmin dharmamukhastrotasi tathāgatajñānopasaṃhāraṃ kurvanti |
SA11n1085:179: imān punaraśāntānapraśāntān bālapṛthagjanān nānākleśasamudācāraprāptān vividhavitarkopahatamānasān samanvāhara, apekṣasva |
SA11n1085:184: utpādādvā tathāgatānāmanutpādādvā sthitaivaiṣā dharmatā dharmadhātusthitiḥ yadidaṃ sarvadharmaśūnyatā sarvadharmānupalabdhiḥ |
SA11n1085:188: prekṣasva tāvat tvamasmākaṃ kāyāpramāṇatāṃ ca jñānāpramāṇatāṃ ca buddhakṣetrāpramāṇatāṃ ca jñānābhinirhārāpramāṇatāṃ ca prabhāmaṇḍalāpramāṇatāṃ ca svarāṅgaviśuddhayapramāṇatāṃ ca |
SA11n1085:199: prekṣasva tāvad daśasu dikṣu apramāṇakṣetratāṃ ca apramāṇasattvatāṃ ca apramāṇadharmavibhaktitāṃ ca |
SA11n1085:203: te buddhā bhagavanta evaṃ bhūmyanugatasya bodhisattvasya evaṃ pramukhānyaprameyāṇyasaṃkhyeyāni jñānābhinirhāramukhānyupasaṃharanti,
SA11n1085:207: te ced buddhā bhagavantastaṃ bodhisattvamevaṃ sarvajñajñānābhinirhāramukheṣu nāvatārayeyustadevāsya parinirvāṇaṃ bhavetsarvasattvakāryapratiprasrabdhiśca |
SA11n1085:209: yacca āryavimalakīrtinirdeśe gayāśīrṣe coktaṃ tadapi pūrvoktaṃ virudhyate,
SA11n1085:219: tena saddharmaṃ pratikṣipatā tathāgato'bhyākhyāto bhavati“ iti vistaram uktvā āha-“yo'yaṃ maitreya,
SA11n1085:220: ṣaṭpāramitāsamudāgamo bodhisattvānāṃ bodhāya taṃ te mohapuruṣā evaṃ vakṣyanti |
SA11n1085:225: ajita ! duṣprajñaḥ sa kāśirājo'bhūd yena kapotārtha śyenāya svamāṃsāni dattāni ?
SA11n1085:236: tat te mohapuruṣā evaṃ vakṣyanti-ekanayenaiva bodhiryaduta śūnyatānayena“ iti vistaraḥ |
SA11n1085:237: vairocanābhisambodhau coktam-'tadetat sarvajñajñānaṃ karuṇāmūlaṃ bodhicittahetukam upāyaparyavasānam“ iti |
SA11n1085:240: tathā hi dānāderūpāyasya rūpakāyakṣetraparivārādimahābhogatāphalasampatparigrahād bhagavatāṃ na nirvāṇe'vasthānam |
SA11n1085:241: prajñayā ca sakalaviparyāsaprahāṇād na saṃsāre'vasthānaṃ viparyāsamūlatvāt saṃsārasya |
SA11n1085:242: anyā ca prajñopāyasvarūpayā pratipadā samāropāpavādāntavivarjanena madhyamā pratipad udbhāvitā |
SA11n1085:247: yat punaruktam-“kolopamaṃ dharmaparyāyam ājānadbhirdharmā eva prahātavyāḥ,
SA11n1085:253: yaccāpi kvacid dānādi sāṃsārikaphalatvena varṇitaṃ tat prajñārahitānāṃ dānādīnāṃ pūrvam uktaṃ tāvanmātrakuśalamūlasantuṣṭāṃścādhikṛtyottara kuśalamūle protsāhanārtham |
SA11n1085:254: anyathā [ārya-] vimalakīrtinīrdeśaḥ [ādi pūrvoktaḥ] sarva eva virudhyate |
SA11n1085:256: tatra prajñāparigṛhītā dānādayaḥ pāramitāvyapadeśaṃ labhante nānyatheti |
SA11n1085:257: ato dānadipariśuddhaye samādhānam āsthāya prajñopādānārthaṃ yatnaṃ kurvīta |
SA11n1085:262: anyathā hi viparītasyāpi bhavānād vicikitsāyāścāvyapagamāt samyagjñānodayo na syāt |
SA11n1085:269: yo anyaheturna sa bhoti śāntaye || iti |
SA11n1085:270: tasmāccintāmayyā prajñayā yuktayāgamābhyāṃ pratyavekṣya bhūtameva vastusvarūpaṃ bhāvanīyam |
SA11n1085:271: vastūnāṃ svarūpaṃ ca paramārthato'nutpāda evāgamato yuktitaśca niścitam |
SA11n1085:272: tatrāgamato yathoktam āryadharmasaṅgītau-“anutpādaḥ satyamasatyam anye dharmāḥ“ iti |
SA11n1085:278: tasmāt tathāgato mahākāruṇiko lokasyottrāsapadaparihārāthaṃ vyavahāravaśād uktavān,
SA11n1085:279: utpadyate nirudhyate ceti na cātra kasyacid dharmasyotpādaḥ“ iti |
SA11n1085:290: yāvad vijñānaṃ vijñānasvabhāvena śūnyamiti svalakṣaṇaśūnyatām upādāya“ iti |
SA11n1085:294: pitāputrasamāgame coktam-“sarva ete dharmāḥ sarve samāstraikālyasamatayā |
SA11n1085:295: atīte'dhvani sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvarahitā yāvat pratyutpanne'dhvani“ iti |
SA11n1085:300: utpādo bhāvānāmahetuko vā syāt sahetuko vā |
SA11n1085:302: kāraṇānapekṣā hi viśeṣābhāvād utpādakālavat sadā sarvatraiva ca bhāvāḥ kiṃ na bhaveyuḥ |
SA11n1085:303: abhāvakālād aviśeṣād vā utpādakāle'pi naiva bhaveyuḥ |
SA11n1085:306: tathā hi yastāvadīśvarādistīrthikairnityo hetuḥ kalpitastato bhāvā na jāyante krameṇotpādadarśanāt |
SA11n1085:313: teṣāṃ kvacidapi kārye na krameṇa sāmarthyaṃ yathā vicāritam |
SA11n1085:315: tathā hi sarvakāryaṃ sakṛd utpādyoktarakāle'pi yadyutpattisamartha evāsau tadā punarapi samarthasvabhāvānuvṛttau pūrvavat kāryotpattiprasaṅgaḥ |
SA11n1085:317: tasmānna nityaṃ nāma kiñcid vastu vidyate |
SA11n1085:318: ata evoktaṃ bhagavatā-“asatsamāropaḥ punarmahāmate ! ākāśanirodhanirvāṇa [ādi] akṛtakabhāvābhiniveśasamāropaḥ“ iti |
SA11n1085:323: tathā hi na tāvat samānakālaṃ kāraṇaṃ svabhāvavat kāryasyāpi tatsamānakālabhāvitayā niṣpannatvāt |
SA11n1085:326: avyavadhānenāpyutpāde sarvātmānā yadyavyavadhāṇaṃ tadaikasminneva kṣaṇe sarvakṣaṇānām anupraveśāt kalpasya kṣaṇamātratāprasaṅgaḥ |
SA11n1085:331: nirhetukapakṣeṇaivāsya pakṣasya saṅgṛhītatvāt svātmani ca kāritravirodhāt |
SA11n1085:336: bhāvā vidyanti saṃvṛtyā paramārthe na bhāvakāḥ |
SA11n1085:342: tatrāpi tāvad rūpiṇo ghatādayaste'ṇuśo vibhinnarūpatvād naikasvabhāvāḥ |
SA11n1085:343: aṇūnāṃ pūrvāparasthitānāṃ pūrvādidigbhāgatvena vibhidyamānānām asiddhāvapyaṇusaṃcayātmakatve nānekasvabhāvo yuktaḥ,
SA11n1085:344: na caikānekasvabhāvavyatirekeṇāparaḥ kaścid bhāvasvabhāvo'stīti niḥsvabhāvā evāmī paramārthataḥ svapnādyupalabdharūpādivad rūpiṇo bhavāḥ |
SA11n1085:348: ye cārupiṇaste'pi tathaiva vicāryumāṇā niḥsvabhāvā eva |
SA11n1085:349: tathāhi, bāhyasya nīlāderarthasyābhāvāt sāmarthyata eva vijñānādayo'rūpiṇaḥ skandhā nilādirūpeṇa pratibhāsanta ityabhyupeyam |
SA11n1085:351: “bahirdhā nāsti vairūpaṃ svacittaṃ dṛśyate bahiḥ |“ iti |
SA11n1085:352: tataśca nīlādicitrākāranirbhāsatayā grāhyagrāhakākāranirbhāsatayā naikasvabhāvā amī yuktāḥ |
SA11n1085:357: athavā tatrālīkā evāmī rūpādaya ākārāḥ pratibhāsanta ityubyupagamyate,
SA11n1085:360: na hi svayaṃ prakāśamānarūpatāvyatirekeṇānyad vijñānasya rūpamasti |
SA11n1085:362: teṣāṃ ca vijñānasvarūpāpannānām alīkatve sarvameva vijñānam alīkam abhyupetaṃ syāt |
SA11n1085:364: tasmād ekānekasvabhāvaśūnyatvena paramārthato'līkā evāmī sarvabhāvā iti niścitametat |
SA11n1085:367: dṛśyate na ca tatrāsti tathā bhāveṣu bhavatā ||iti |
SA11n1085:373: tadevaṃ cintāmayyā prajñayā niścitya bhūtamartha tasya pratyakṣīkaraṇāya bhāvanāmayīṃ prajñām utpādayet |
SA11n1085:379: tathā ca bhāvanāyāḥ parisphuṭajñānaphalatvena sāphalyamuktam āryasamādhirāje-
SA11n1085:386: tatra prathamataraṃ tāvad yoginā śamatho niṣpādanīyaścittasthirīkaraṇāya |
SA11n1085:389: na cāsamāhitena cetasā yathābhutaṃ śakyate jñātum |
SA11n1085:390: uktaṃ hi bhagavatā-“samāhitacitto yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti“ iti |
SA11n1085:391: śamatho lābhādikāmanānirapekṣasya samyakpravṛttau sthirasya duḥkhādyadhivāsanaśilasyārabdhavīryasya śīghrataraṃ sampadyate |
SA11n1085:392: ata eva āryasaṃdhinirvocanādau dānādaya uttarottaratvena varṇitāḥ |
SA11n1085:393: tadevaṃ śīlādiśamathasambhāreṣu sthito mano'nukūladeśe sarvabuddhabodhisattveṣu praṇāmādikaṃ kṛtvā pāpadeśanāṃ puṇyānumodanāṃ vidhāya sakalajagadabhyuddharaṇāśayo mahākaruṇām evābhimukhīkṛtya kāyam ṛjuṃ praṇidhāya sukhāsanopaviṣṭaḥ paryaṅkamābhujya samādhimabhiniṣpādayet |
SA11n1085:394: tatra prathamaṃ tāvad yad vastu vicārayitavyaṃ yāvatā prakāreṇa saṅkṣepataḥ sakalavastusaṅgraho bhavati tatra cittaṃ badhnīyat |
SA11n1085:396: etaccādikarmikasya vikṣepadoṣaparihārārtha saṃkṣiptaṃ tāvad yuktam ālambayitum |
SA11n1085:397: yadā tu jitamanaskāro bhavati tadā skandhadhātvādibhedena viśodhya vistaraśo'pyālambata eva |
SA11n1085:398: tathā sandhinirmocanādau yoginām aṣṭādaśaprakāraśūnyatālambanādibhedena nānāprakāram ālambanam uktam |
SA11n1085:399: atraiva bhagavatā sattvānugrahād rūpyarūpyādibhedena saṃkṣepamadhyavistāraiḥ vastubhedo'bhidharmādau nirdiṣṭaḥ |
SA11n1085:401: tato niścitya sarvaṃ vastusaṅgrahaṃ tatraiva punaścittaṃ prabandhena prerayet |
SA11n1085:402: yada tvantarā rāgādinā cittaṃ bahirvikṣipet tadāvagamya vikṣepatām aśubhādibhāvanayā vikṣepam upaśāmya punastatraivoparyupari cittaṃ prerayet |
SA11n1085:407: atha yadā styānamiddhābhibhavād āalambanagrahaṇāprakaṭatayālīnaṃ cittaṃ bhavati tadā lokasaṃjñābhāvanayā prāmodyavastubuddhādiguṇamanasikārāt [vā] layaṃ upaśāmya punastadevālambanaṃ dṛḍhataraṃ gṛṇhīyāt |
SA11n1085:408: atha yadā pūrvahasitaramitādyanusmarato'ntarā cittam uddhataṃ paśyet,
SA11n1085:411: atha yadā layauddhatyabhyāṃ viviktatayā samapravṛttaṃ svarasavāhicittaṃ paśyet tadābhogaśithīlīkaraṇād upekṣate |
SA11n1085:414: yadā tu tatrālambane'nabhisaṃskāravāhi yāvadicchaṃ cittaṃ pravṛttaṃ bhavati,
SA11n1085:420: ayaṃ ca śamathamārgo bhagavatā āryaprajñāpāramitādau nirdiṣṭaḥ |
SA11n1085:446: eṣa caiṣāṃ padānām arthaḥ pūrvācāryaiḥ maitreyeṇa ca vyākhyātaḥ |
SA11n1085:447: saṃkṣepeṇa sarvasaiva samādheḥ ṣaḍ doṣā bhavanti |
SA11n1085:469: layauddhatyāpraśamanakāle tvanābhogadoṣaḥ tatpratipakṣeṇa ca cetanā bhāvanīyā |
SA11n1085:470: layauddhatyapraśame sati yadā cittaṃ praśamavāhi tadā''bhogadoṣaḥ,
SA11n1085:472: ebhiraṣṭābhiḥ prahāṇasaṃskāraiḥ samanvāgataḥ samādhiḥ paramakarmaṇyo bhavati |
SA11n1085:474: ata evoktaṃ sūtra-“[aṣṭa] prahāṇa [saṃskāra] samanvāgataḥ ṛddhipādaṃ bhāvayati“ iti |
SA11n1085:475: eṣā ca cittaikāgratā uttarottarakarmaṇyatāsamprayogād ālambanādiguṇaviśeṣayogācca dhyānārūpisamāpattiḥ vimokṣādivyapadeśaṃ labhate |
SA11n1085:476: tathā hi yadopekṣāvedanāsamprayuktā savitarkasavicārā sā bhavati,
SA11n1085:478: yadā ca kāmatṛṣṇayā pāpadharmaiśca] viviktā bhavati [vitarkavicāra] prītisukhādhyātmasamprasādaiḥ samprayuktā bhavati,
SA11n1085:481: yadā vitarkavicārarahitā prathamadhyānabhūmitṛṣṇayā viviktā ca bhavati |
SA11n1085:493: anyathā hi tīrthikānāmiva samādhimātreṇa kleśaprahāṇaṃ na syāt |
SA11n1085:505: jñānaṃ nirātmakaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ nirābhāse na paśyati ||iti |
SA11n1085:506: tatrāyamarthaḥ-prathamaṃ yogī ye rūpiṇo dharmā bāhyārthatayā paraiḥ parikalpitāsteṣu tāvad vicārayet |
SA11n1085:511: paramāṇūṃśca bhāgaśaḥ pratyavekṣa-māṇo yogī tān arthānna samanupaśyati |
SA11n1085:512: tasyāsamanupaśyata evaṃ bhavati cittamātramevaitat sarvaṃ na punarbāhyo'rthā vipadyate | tadevam-
SA11n1085:517: tatra yaccittamātraṃ tadapyasati grāhye grāhako na yukto grāhakasya grāhyapekṣatvad tataścittaṃ grāhyagrāhakaviviktam advayameva cittamiti vicārayed advayalakṣaṇe-
SA11n1085:521: evaṃ cittamātramatikramya tadapi dvayanirābhasaṃ yajjñānaṃ tadatikrameta |
SA11n1085:522: svataḥ parato bhāvānāṃ janmānupapatteḥ grāhyagrāhakayoścālīkatve tadavyatirekāt tasyāpi satyatvamayuktamiti vicārayet |
SA11n1085:527: tathā cādvayajñānanirābhāse jñāne yadā sthito yogī tadā paramatattve sthitatvāt,
SA11n1085:529: etadeva tat mahāyānam ucyate yat paramatattvadarśanam |
SA11n1085:530: etadeva tat paramatattvadarśanaṃ yat sarvadharmān prajñācakṣuṣā nirūpayataḥ samyagjñānāvaloke satyadarśanam |
SA11n1085:533: atredṛśamevādarśanamabhipretaṃ na tu nimīlitākṣajātyandhānāmiva pratyayavaikalyād amanasikārato vā yadadarśanam |
SA11n1085:534: tato bhāvābhiniveśadiviparyāsavāsanāyā aprahīṇatvād asaṃjñisamāpattyādivyutthitasyeva punarapi bhāvābhiniveśamūlasya rāgādikleśagaṇasyotpatteramukta eva yogī bhavet |
SA11n1085:537: tatrāpi prajñayā nirūpayato yo'nupalambhaḥ sa tatrāmanasikāro'bhipreto na manasikārābhāvamātram |
SA11n1085:538: na hyasaṃjñisamāpattyādiriva anādikāliko rūpādyabhiniveśo manasikāraparivarjanamātrāt prahīyate |
SA11n1085:539: saṃśayā prahāṇe tu na pūrvopalabdheṣu ca rūpādiṣvabhiniveśamanasikāraparivarjanaṃ śakyaṃ kartum agnyaparivarjane dāhāparivarjanavat |
SA11n1085:540: tathāmī rūpādimithyāvikalpāḥ kaṇṭakādivadutkīlya na hastena cetaso'panetavyāḥ |
SA11n1085:542: tacca saṃśayabījaṃ yoginaḥ samādhyāloke sati prajñācakṣuṣā nirūpayatastesāṃ rūpādīnāṃ pūrvopalabdhānām upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptānām anupalambhād,
SA11n1085:545: tathā saṃśayabījāpagamād rūpādinimittamanasikāraḥ śakyate varjayituṃ nānyathā |
SA11n1085:546: anyathā hyasati samādhyāloke prajñācakṣuṣāpyanavaloke yathā andhakūpāvasthitapuruṣasyāvacarakagataghāṭādiṣviva yogino rūpādiṣvastitvasaṃśayo naiva nivarteta |
SA11n1085:547: tadanivṛttyā cā prahīṇatimiradoṣasyeva yo'yukto'līkarūpādyabhiniveśaḥ pravarteta na kenāpi nivartyeta |
SA11n1085:548: tasmāt samādhihastena manaḥ sandhāya sūkṣmataraprajñāśastreṇa tatra cetasi rūpādimithyāvikalpabījam uddharet |
SA11n1085:549: evam satyutkhātamūlā iva taravo bhūmernirmūlatayā mithyāvikalpāḥ punaścetasi na virohanti |
SA11n1085:550: ata evāvaraṇaprahāṇāya śamathavipaśyanāyuganaddhavāhī mārgo bhagavatā nirdiṣṭaḥ,
SA11n1085:557: tathā hi yadā śamathenālambane cittaṃ sthirīkṛtaṃ bhavati tadā prajñayā vicārayataḥ samyagjñānāloka utpadyate,
SA11n1085:562: sa ca samāhito yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīti vacanādekāntena prajñānukūla eva bhavati,
SA11n1085:563: na tu viruddhastasmāt syāt samāhitasya prajñayā nirūpayataḥ sarvadharmāṇāmanupalambhaḥ |
SA11n1085:568: tathā hi yadā prajñayā nirūpayan na kiñcid bhāvasvabhāvam upalabhate yogī,
SA11n1085:573: yadā tu kālatraye'pi bhāvo yoginā prajñācakṣuṣā nirūpayatā nopalabdhaḥ,
SA11n1085:575: evamanye'pi vikalpāstadā tasya na samutpadyanta eva bhāvābhāvavikalpābhyāṃ sarvavikalpasya vyāptatvāt |
SA11n1085:578: tatra sthitasya yoginaḥ sarvavikalpānām astaṃgamāt samyak kleśāvaraṇaṃ jñeyāvaraṇaṃ ca prahīyate |
SA11n1085:579: tathā hi kleśāvaraṇasyānutpannāniruddhabhāveṣu bhāvādiviparyāso mūlaṃ kāraṇam āryasatyadvayanirdeśādau varṇitaṃ bhagavatā |
SA11n1085:580: anena ca yogābhyāsena sarvabhāvādivikalpānāṃ prahāṇāt sakalabhāvādiviparyāsasyāvidyāsvabhāvasya kleśāvaraṇamūlasya prahāṇam |
SA11n1085:591: yaḥ punaḥ devaputra ! paramārthato'tyantājātānutpannābhāvān sarvadharmān prajānāti,
SA11n1085:595: yaśca yoniśaḥ prayuktaḥ tasyātmasamāropo na bhavati |
SA11n1085:596: yasyātmasamāropo na bhavati tasya dṛṣṭiparyutthānaṃ na bhavati |
SA11n1085:597: yāvat paramārthato nirvāṇadṛṣṭisarva dṛṣṭiparyutthānam api na bhavati |
SA11n1085:598: tasyaivam anutpādavihāriṇaḥ kleśā atyantaṃ vinītā draṣṭavyāḥ |
SA11n1085:600: yadā, devaputra ! kleśān nirābhāsena jñānena paramārthato'tyantaśūnyān atyantābhāvān atyantanirnimittāt prajānāti,
SA11n1085:605: evameva devaputra ! ya kleśānāṃ gotraṃ prajānāti tasya kleśāḥ praśāmyanti |
SA11n1085:607: āha-yāvad eṣā paramārthato'tyantājātānutpannābhāveṣu sarvadharmeṣu kalpanā idaṃ kleśānāṃ gotram“ iti vistaraḥ |
SA11n1085:609: tatprahāṇe sakalaviparyāsaprahāṇād jñeyāvaraṇam apyanena samyak prahīyate,
SA11n1085:611: jñeyāvaraṇe ca prahīṇe pratibandhābhāvād ravikiraṇavad apagatameghādyāvaraṇe nabhasi sarvatrāvyāhato yogi pratyakṣo jñānālokaḥ pravartate |
SA11n1085:613: tacca saṃnihitam api vastu pratibandhasadbhāvānna prakāśayati |
SA11n1085:615: acintyaśaktiviśeṣalābhāt kimiti sakalam eva vastu yathāvad na prakāśayet |
SA11n1085:616: ataḥ saṃvṛtiparamārtharūpeṇa sakalasya vastuno yathāvat parijñānāt sarvajñatvam avāpyate |
SA11n1085:617: ato'yam evāvaraṇaprahāṇo sarvajñatvādhigame ca paramo mārgaḥ |
SA11n1085:618: yastu śrāvakādīnāṃ mārgastena viparyāsāprahāṇān na samyag āvaraṇadvayaṃ prahīyate |
SA11n1085:619: tathā coktam āryalaṅkāvatāre-“anye tu kāraṇādhīnān sarvadharmān dṛṣṭvā'nirvāṇe'pi nirvāṇam iti buddhayo bhavanti |
SA11n1085:624: ata eva cānyena mārgeṇa mokṣābhāvād ekam eva yānam uktaṃ bhagavatā |
SA11n1085:627: na tvātmāstīti bhāvayan śrāvakaḥ pudgalanairātmyam avatarati,
SA11n1085:632: uktaṃ ca āryalokottaraparivarte “punaraparaṃ bho jinaputra ! cittamātraṃ traidhātukam avatarati,
SA11n1085:636: sā ceyaṃ yoginām avasthā kuto viśodhitā ? ityāha-
SA11n1085:639: tataḥ praṇidhānabalād uttarottaradānādikuśalābhyāsāt sā tathā viśuddhā jāta,
SA11n1085:640: yena sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatājñāne'pi sakalasattvāpekṣā na vyāvartate yāvat saṃsāra eva ananuliptāḥ saṃsāradoṣairavatiṣṭhanta iti |
SA11n1085:642: jñānaṃ nirātmakaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ nirābhāsena paśyati | iti |
SA11n1085:643: yasmād yad advayalakṣaṇaṃ jñānam advayavādināṃ śreṣṭhaṃ paramārthenābhimataṃ tadapi nirātmakaṃ niḥsvabhāvam advayanirābhāsena jñānena paśyati yogī |
SA11n1085:650: kintu saṃvṛtyā yathā rūpādīviṣayākārajñānotpādamātreṇa vijñānameva loke tathā tathā vyavahriyate devadatto yajñadattaṃ jñānena paśyatīti na tu kaścid ātmādirasti |
SA11n1085:651: tathā'trāpi jñānamevādvayajñānanirābhāsam utpadyamānaṃ tathā vyapadiśyate nirābhāsena jñānena paśyatiti |
SA11n1085:652: na hi sarvadharmāṇāṃ paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatve'pi saṃvṛtyā yogijñānam anyad vā pṛthagjñānaṃ neṣṭam |
SA11n1085:653: tathā coktam āryasatyadvayanirdeśe-“paramārthato'tyantābhāvaśca saṃvṛttyā ca mārga bhāvayati“ iti |
SA11n1085:655: kintu yasya saṃvṛtyā'pi kāraṇaṃ nāsti sa saṃvṛtyā'pi notpadyate |
SA11n1085:657: yasya tu [kāraṇaṃ] vidyate sa paramārthato'līko'pi samutpadyata eva |
SA11n1085:659: na ca māyādeḥ saṃvṛtyā pratītyasamutpāde paramārthato vastutvaprasaṅgaḥ,
SA11n1085:662: tatra yathā kleśakarmamāyāvaśāt sattvānāṃ janmamāyā pravarteta,
SA11n1085:663: tathā yogināmapi puṇyajñānasambhāramāyāvaśād yogijñānamāyā pravartata eva |
SA11n1085:672: te hi māyākāravat tāṃ māyāṃ yathāvat parijñānāt satyato nābhiniviśante,
SA11n1085:674: ye tāṃ bālapṛthagjanavat kautūhalaṃ styatvenābhiniviṣṭāste viparītābhiniveśad bāla ucyante iti sarvamaviruddham |
SA11n1085:677: na cāsya nirmite saṅgo jñātapūrvo yato'sya saḥ ||
SA11n1085:681: tatra ca layauddhatyādīn vyutthitān pūrvavat praśamayet |
SA11n1085:682: yadā tu sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatālambane ca layauddhatyādirahitam anabhisaṃskāreṇa pravṛttaṃ jñānaṃ bhavati,
SA11n1085:684: tathā yāvat śaknoti tāvad adhimuktibalena adhimukticaryābhūmau sthito bhāvayet |
SA11n1085:685: tato yathecchaṃ paryaṅkamābhujya vyutthāya punarevaṃ cintayet |
SA11n1085:686: yadi nāmāmī dharmāḥ paramārthata eva niḥsvabhāvā apyete saṃvṛtyā sthitā eva |
SA11n1085:687: tathā coktam āryaratnameghe-“kathaṃ bodhisattvo nairātmyakuśalo bhavati ?
SA11n1085:694: evaṃ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyotpādaṃ nopalabhate,
SA11n1085:697: ayaṃ ca paramārthato'nutpādavihāriṇyāḥ prajñāyā na punarvyāvahārikeṇa svabhāvena“ iti vistaraḥ |
SA11n1085:698: ete ca bālabuddhaya evaṃ niḥsvabhāveṣu bhāveṣu viparītābhiniveśāt saṃsāre paribhramanto vividhāni duḥkhāni pratyanubhavanti |
SA11n1085:699: mahākaruṇām eva āmukhīkṛtya evamanuvicintayet-tathā'haṃ kariṣyāmi yathā sarvajñatvaṃ prāpya eteṣāṃ dharmatāmavabodhayeyamiti |
SA11n1085:702: tathā coktam āryadharmasaṃgītau-“yathābhūtadarśino bodhisattvasya sattveṣu mahākaruṇā pravartate |
SA11n1085:703: evaṃ cāsya bhavati-idaṃ mayā samādhimukhaṃ sarvadharmayathābhūtadarśaṃ ca sarvasattvānāṃ nispādayitavyam |
SA11n1085:704: sa tayā mahākaruṇayā saṃcodyamāno'dhiśīlam adhicittam adhiprajñaṃ ca śikṣātrayaṃ paripūryānuttaraṃ samyaksambodhim abhisambudhyate“ iti |
SA11n1085:705: ayameva prajñopāyayuganaddhabāhī bodhisattvānāṃ mārgo yat paramārthadarśane'pi saṃvṛtiṃ nocchedayanti |
SA11n1085:706: saṃvṛtiṃ cānucchedayanto mahākaruṇāpūrvaṅgamā aviparyastā eva sattvārthakriyāsu pravartante |
SA11n1085:712: na ca taddhetukaṃ tannidānaṃ tatpratyayam ucchedadṛṣṭau patati “ iti |
SA11n1085:721: sā mayā pratipattiḥ pratipattavyā sarvasattvānāṃ hitāvahā sukhāvahā |
SA11n1085:722: tasya skandheṣu māyāvat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca skandhaparityāgaṃ spṛhayatīti |
SA11n1085:723: dhātuṣvāśīviṣavat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca dhātuparityāgaṃ spṛhayatīti |
SA11n1085:725: rūpasya phenapiṇḍavat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca tathāgatarūpakāyaviṭhapanāṃ jahāti |
SA11n1085:726: vedanāyā budbudvat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca tathāgatadhyānasamādhisamāpattisukhaniṣpadanaprayogaṃ nārabhate |
SA11n1085:727: saṃjñāyāṃ marīcivat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca tathāgatajñānaniṣpādana apratipattiḥ |
SA11n1085:728: saṃskārāṇāṃ kadalīvat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca buddhadharmasaṃskārāṇām apratipattiḥ |
SA11n1085:729: vijñānasya māyāvat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca jñānapūrvaṅgamakāyavāṅmanaskarmaniṣpādanā pratipattiḥ“ iti vistaraḥ |
SA11n1085:731: tatra yadi nāma lokottaraprajñāvasthāyām upāyasevanā na sambhavati,
SA11n1085:732: upāyasevanākāle tu bodhisattvasya māyākāravad aviparyastatvāt lokottarajñānāt prayogapṛṣṭhabhāvani yathāvad vastuparamārthatattvābhiniveśanī prajñāsambhavatyeveti,
SA11n1085:735: evamanena krameṇa bodhisattvasya prajñām upāyaṃ ca satataṃ satkṛtya dīrghakālābhyāsena bhāvayato dvādaśāvasthāviśeṣā bhavanti |
SA11n1085:742: asyāmapi bhūmau vartamāno bodhisattva pṛthagjano'pi sarvabālavipattisamatikrānto'saṃkhyeyasamādhidhāraṇīvimokṣābhijñādiguṇānvita āryaratnameghe paṭhyate |
SA11n1085:743: asyā eva ca mṛdumadhyādhimātrādhimātratarāvasthācatuṣṭayena catvāri nirvedhabhāgīyāni vyavasthāpyante |
SA11n1085:744: tathā hi yadā [bāhyārtha vibhāvayatā] īṣatspaṣṭo jñānāloko bhavati tadā uṣmagatanāmakaṃ nirvedhabhāgīyaṃ bhavati |
SA11n1085:746: yadā tu sa eva jñānaloko madhyamaspaṣṭo bhavati,
SA11n1085:753: yadā tu grāhyagrāhakākārarahitam advayaṃ jñānaṃ vibhāvayet tadā'gradharmākhyaṃ nirvedhabhāgīyaṃ bhavati |
SA11n1085:759: tathā hi yadā'gradharmānantaraṃ prathamataraṃ lokottaraṃ sarvaprapañcarahitaṃ sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatāsākṣātkāri sphuṭataraṃ jñānam utpadyate,
SA11n1085:760: tadā bodhisattvaḥ samyaktvanyayābhāvakrāntito darśanamārgotpādāt prathamāṃ bhūmiṃ praviṣṭo bhavati |
SA11n1085:761: ata evāsyāṃ bhūmau prathamato'nadhigatatattvādhigamād bodhisattvaḥ pramudito bhavati |
SA11n1085:763: atra ca dvādaśottaraṃ darśanaheyaṃ kleśaśataṃ prahīyate |
SA11n1085:766: asyāṃ ca bhūmau bodhisattvasya dharmadhātusamudāgamatāprabodhāt svārtha iva parāthe pravartanād dānapāramitā'tiriktatarā bhavati |
SA11n1085:767: sa ca bodhisattvaḥ samadhigatatattvo'pi vā yāvann śaknoti sūkṣmāpattiskhaliteṣu samprajanyavihāri bhavituṃ tāvat prathamā bhūmiḥ |
SA11n1085:770: ata evāsyāṃ bhūmau sūkṣmāpattiskhalitasamudācārāt śīlapāramitā'tiriktatarā bhavati |
SA11n1085:773: yāvanna śaknoti sakalalaukikaṃ samādhiṃ samāpattuṃ yathāśrutaṃ cārtham ādharttuṃ tāvad dvitīyaiva bhūmiḥ |
SA11n1085:776: asyāṃ ca bhūmau bodhisattvasya śrutadhāraṇyā sarvalaukikasamādhyābhinirhārārthaṃ sarvaduḥkhasahanāt,
SA11n1085:778: teṣāṃ samādhīnāṃ lābhād iya bhūmirapramāṇaṃ lokottaraṃ jñānāvabhāsaṃ karotīti prabhākarītyucyate |
SA11n1085:779: sa pratilabdhalaukikasakalasamādhirapi yāvann śaknoti yathāpratilabdhairbodhipakṣairdharmairbahulaṃ vihartuṃ sarvasamāpattīnāṃ ca cittam upekṣituṃ tāvat tṛtīyā bhūmiḥ |
SA11n1085:780: yadā tu śaknoti tadā tasyāṅgasya paripūritaścaturthī bhūmirvyavasthāpyate |
SA11n1085:783: iyaṃ ca sakalakleśendhanadāhasamarthasya bodhipakṣadharmārciṣa udgatatvād arciṣmatītyucyate |
SA11n1085:785: yāvanna śaknoti satyāni bhāvayan saṃsārānabhimukhaṃ nirvāṇābhimukhaṃ ca ceto vyāvartayitum upāyasaṃgṛhītān bodhipakṣān dharmān bhāvayitum,
SA11n1085:787: yadā tu śaknoti tadā'syāṅgasya paripūritaḥ pañcamī bhūmirvyavasthāpyate |
SA11n1085:788: ata evāsyām iyam upāyasaṃgṛhītā bodhipakṣabhāvanā [paripūritena] suṣṭhu duḥkhena jīyate abhyasyatā iti sudurjayetyujyate |
SA11n1085:791: yāvad na śaknoti saṃsārapravṛttipratyavekṣaṇān nirvitsahayā cittasantatyā'nimittavihāraṃ samāpattuṃ tāvat pañcamī bhūmiḥ |
SA11n1085:792: yadā śaknoti tadā'syāṅgasya paripūritaḥ ṣaṣṭhī bhūmirvyavasthāpyate |
SA11n1085:793: asyāṃ ca bodhisattvasya pratītyasamutpādabhāvanāvihārāt prajñāpāramitā'tiriktatarā bhavati |
SA11n1085:794: ata eva prajñāpāramitāyā atiriktataratvāt sarvabuddhadharmeṣu abhimukho'syāṃ bhūmau vartata iti kṛtvā abhimukhītyucyate |
SA11n1085:798: yadā śaknoti tadā'syāṅgasya paripūritaḥ saptamī bhūmirvyavasthāpyate |
SA11n1085:799: asyāmapi bhūmau bodhisattvaḥ sarvanimittaṃ nirnimittena pratividhyati nimittakṛtavyavahāraṃ ca na virodhayati |
SA11n1085:801: iyaṃ ca bhūmiranābhogamārgopaśleṣāt suṣṭhu dūraṅgamād dūraṅgamā |
SA11n1085:803: yāvanna śaknotyanābhogavāhinam animittavihāraṃ samāpattuṃ tāvat saptamī bhūmiḥ |
SA11n1085:805: asyāṃ ca bhūmau anābhogena kuśalapakṣayogāt praṇidhānapāramitā'tiriktatarā bhavati |
SA11n1085:808: yāvanna śaknoti paryāyaniruktyādiprabhedaiḥ sarvākārasarvadharmadeśanāyāṃ vaśībhavituṃ tāvad aṣṭamī bhūmiḥ |
SA11n1085:809: yadā śaknoti tadā'syāṅgasya paripūrito navamī bhūmirvyavasthāpyate |
SA11n1085:810: asyāṃ ca bhūmau bodhisattvasya pratisaṃvid-viśeṣalābhāt prajñābalaviśeṣayogād balapāramitā'tiriktatarā bhavati |
SA11n1085:813: yāvanna śaknoti buddhakṣetraparṣannirmāṇādi darśayituṃ paripūrṇadharmasambhogaṃ sattvaparipākaṃ ca kartum,
SA11n1085:815: yadā tu śaknoti tadā'syāṅgasya paripūrito daśamī bhūmirvyavasthāpyate |
SA11n1085:816: asyāṃ ca nirmāṇādinā sattvaparipācanāya jñānaviśeṣayogād bodhisattvasya jñānapāramitā'tiriktatarā bhavati |
SA11n1085:817: iyaṃ ca dharmadeśanāmeghaiḥ ananteṣu lokadhātuṣu dharmapravarṣaṇād dharmameghetyucyate |
SA11n1085:820: sa pratilabdha-nirmāṇādivaśito'pi yāvan na śaknoti sarvasmin jñeye sarvākāram asaktam |
SA11n1085:821: apratihataṃ jñānam utpādayituṃ tāvad daśamī bhūmi |
SA11n1085:824: asyāśca buddhabhūmeḥ sarvākārasakalasaṃpatprakarṣḍaparyantagamanānnāparam utkṛṣṭaṃ sthānāntaramasti [tasmāt tataḥ paraṃ nāsti bhūmivyavasthā] iti |
SA11n1085:825: asyāśca buddhamūmerguṇapakṣaprabhedo buddhairapi na śakyate sarvākāraṃ vaktum |
SA11n1085:832: aśeṣadoṣāpagamaniṣṭhāṃ prāpya bhagavān buddho dharmakāye sthitvā sambhoganirmāṇakāyābhyām anābhogarūpeṇa aśeṣajagadartha kurvan yāvat saṃsāraṃ viharati |
SA11n1085:833: tasmāt prekṣavadbhiḥ sarvaguṇākareṣu bhagavatsu śraddhā utpadanīyā,
SA11n1085:840: bhūpatiśrīdevarājavacanena] kamalaśīlena bhāvanākramasya ayaṃ saṃkṣepaḥ kṛtaḥ |
